name: One Knight Remains
description:
One Knight Remains is an Arcade/Action game where you play as a Knight trying to hold off a battalion of Orcs, Goblins and other such creatures until you can't hold out any longer and meet the same fate as your companions.

The game takes place in a small arena with waves of enemies spawning off the screen. To move you use the arrow keys and to attack you press the space bar.
